topic: LF Trading Bot Available Data Structures
type: LF Trading Bot - Market Data Structure

definition.text: The Market Data Structure is one of the 3 data structures available at Conditions and Formulas with data from Indicator and Sensor bots.

paragraphs.text: This Javascript object can be used when you want to specify a market which is different fomr the Default Market. In this way you can access data of the ETH/USDT market from a stragegy running for example at the BTC/USDT market.
The root of the object is called...
After it you need to spacify the codeName of an Asset representing the Market Base Asset, like the following...
After that again the codeName of an Asset but this time representing the Market Quoted Asset..
Finally you continue with the syntax of the LF Trading Bot - Chart Data Structure
